data.title: Efrat Eilam
data.meta_description: Learn more about  Efrat Eilam, who is the Associate Professor at Victoria University.
data.text:
Efrat Eilam is a teaching and research academic at the College of Arts, Business, Law, Education and IT. Her research focuses on science and climate change education.

In science education, she studies informal science education settings, the socioscientific issues approach, and classroom emotional climate. In climate change education, Efrat researches curriculum development and implementation.

Efrat participates in developing and teaching units in science and sustainability education for preservice teachers, in the bachelor and masters courses at VU.

Some of Eilam's work on climate change education may be viewed in the following YouTube video links:
